desc: Welcome to the creative world of Jim Shore and his family. This is a new place to discover original artwork, fabrics, quilt patterns, hand-crafted gifts, coloring books, puzzles, and so much more. We are glad you are here!

layout.text: "Not only do I get to do what I love, I get to share it with people around the world. I’ve been given a tremendous gift and I thank God for it every day." 'Jim Shore
